data.actual_result: The height is different for the discriminator and username, also better visible on 110% zoom
data.expected_result: The height is the same like on the app
data.short_description: Name and discriminator on profile are selected at a different height [Firefox/Edge]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open someone's profile - Drag across the user's name and discriminator - Observe the height change between the discriminator and username
